title: SEC EDGAR Entity Resolver - Input
description: Resolve companies to SEC CIK numbers, search filings by form type and date, or extract structured XBRL financial facts from EDGAR. No API key required.

mode.sectionDescription: Select what to do: resolve a company to its SEC profile, search filings, or fetch XBRL financial facts.
mode.title: Scraping mode
mode.description: Select what to do: resolve a company entity, search SEC filings, or get structured XBRL financial facts.

query.sectionDescription: Identify the company or search text. Provide a company name, stock ticker, CIK number, or keyword.
query.title: Search query
query.description: Company name, ticker, or keyword. Used for entity resolution and filing search.

cik.title: CIK number
cik.description: SEC Central Index Key (e.g., 0001045810). Zero-padded to 10 digits automatically.

ticker.title: Stock ticker
ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., NVDA, AAPL, TSLA). Resolved to CIK via SEC ticker list.

formTypes.title: Form types
formTypes.description: SEC form types to include (e.g., 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, S-1). Leave empty for all forms.

dateFrom.title: Filed from
dateFrom.description: Only include filings filed on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

dateTo.title: Filed to
dateTo.description: Only include filings filed on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

maxResults.sectionDescription: Control how many results are returned.
maxResults.title: Max results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000). Free users are limited to 25 per run.

start.title: Start offset
start.description: Pagination offset for search_filings. Use with maxResults to page through large result sets.

maxRecentFilings.title: Max recent filings
maxRecentFilings.description: Number of recent filings to include in resolve_entity output (1-100).

includeAmendments.title: Include amended filings
includeAmendments.description: Include amended filings (forms ending in /A such as 10-K/A). Set to false to exclude amendments.

namespaces.sectionDescription: Filters for get_company_facts mode. Narrow results by XBRL namespace, concept, or period type.
namespaces.title: XBRL namespaces
namespaces.description: Filter facts by XBRL namespace (e.g., us-gaap, dei, ifrs-full). Leave empty for all.

concepts.title: XBRL concepts
concepts.description: Filter facts by concept name (e.g., Revenue, Assets, NetIncomeLoss). Leave empty for all.

periodType.title: Period type
periodType.description: Filter facts by period type: 'instant' (balance sheet) or 'duration' (income statement).

userAgent.sectionDescription: Configure SEC access and request behavior.
userAgent.title: User-Agent (SEC required)
userAgent.description: SEC requires a User-Agent header on all requests. Format: 'YourName your-email@example.com'.

requestIntervalSecs.title: Request interval (seconds)
requestIntervalSecs.description: Minimum seconds between requests to SEC. Lower values are faster but risk rate limiting.

timeoutSecs.title: HTTP timeout (seconds)
timeoutSecs.description: Timeout for each HTTP request to SEC EDGAR.

maxRetries.title: Max retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum retry attempts on failed or rate-limited requests.
